description: This file defines the TransactionCrudScreen widget for creating and editing financial transactions in a Flutter app. It includes form fields for transaction details and handles submission, deletion, and navigation.

classes.name: TransactionCrudScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget serving as the screen for creating or editing a transaction.

classes.name: _TransactionCrudScreenState
classes.description: State class managing form state and transaction operations for TransactionCrudScreen.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes the form with existing transaction data if editing.

methods.name: _submit
methods.description: Handles form submission for creating or updating a transaction.

methods.name: _delete
methods.description: Deletes the current transaction if editing.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the transaction form screen.
